Ok so for the people who don't get the plot, basically, the glasses guy found a misanga (bracelet) online which is said to cause the wearer to see an illusion where they are not wearing any clothes. However, since it's only just the wearer who sees this illusion, its basically a safe way to fulfil your exhibitionism. Next in the classroom, she sees a guy looking towards her when she was masturbating. And because she saw that guy seeing her, she thinks he notices that she was masturbating (which he probably doesn't). [From here it's what I assume is happening since it is fairly confusing to me as well] She then gets horny to thinking she was seen masturbating and decides to skip the next class to go masturbate while having delusions of being blackmailed and raped by the guy. Then goes to the end where the glasses guy finds her passed away after masturbating too much. This may be wrong but it's at least what I think happened.
Love it, please make more exhi doujins :)
